body.p: The IASB decided that, in most cases, an entity should not reassess the discount rate during the lease term. This approach is generally consistent with the approach applied to financial instruments accounted for using the effective interest method. The IASB noted that in other Standards in which the discount rate is required to be reassessed, it is typically because the liability to which the discount rate relates is measured on a current value measurement basis.
